meanings.definition: Pompous or pretentious in speech, manner, or attitude.
meanings.sent1: The highfalutin man talked down to everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: She always wore highfalutin clothes to impress others.
meanings.sent3: The highfalutin peacock strutted around as if he owned the place.
meanings.sent4: Her highfalutin behavior made her seem out of touch with reality.
meanings.sent5: The highfalutin professor spoke in a way that made students feel inferior.

meanings.sent1: The highfalutin restaurant charged exorbitant prices for simple dishes.
meanings.sent2: He drove a highfalutin sports car to show off his wealth.
meanings.sent3: The highfalutin mansion had more rooms than they knew what to do with.
meanings.sent4: Her highfalutin taste in art made her collection the envy of all her friends.
meanings.sent5: The highfalutin fashion show featured designs that were beyond most people's budgets.
